title: FDA E-Submission System (Myanmar)
main_description: An online platform for submitting drug, food, cosmetic, and medical device applications, featuring secure payment, verification integrations, and issuance of approvals.
full_description: Developed Myanmar FDA's e-Submission System for managing regulatory approvals of Food, Drug, Cosmetic, and Medical Device products. Integrated secure payment processing, DICA API verification, and laboratory testing modules. Applied encryption for sensitive data and role-based access control to ensure security and compliance with public health standards.
features: DICA API Integration for Company Verification
MMQR, Visa, MasterCard, and CBPay Payment Integration
Data Encryption (AES-256) and Security Best Practices
Web Security, Performance Optimization, and Caching

title: Human Resource Management System (HRMS)
main_description: A comprehensive HR platform for managing employees, attendance (including fingerprint device integration), payroll, and leave with role-based access control.
full_description: Built an internal HRMS to manage employee profiles, attendance with fingerprint device integration, training programs, performance evaluation, and payroll. Integrated calendar-based leave management and detailed financial reporting. Designed for secure internal deployment, ensuring efficiency, confidentiality, and smooth HR operations.
features: Attendance Tracking with Fingerprint Device Integration
Web Security, Performance Optimization, and Caching

title: Post Market Surveillance System (PMS)
main_description: A platform to monitor and ensure safety compliance for food, drugs, cosmetics, and medical devices through reporting, verification, and risk analysis.
full_description: Developed a comprehensive Post Market Surveillance system to track and analyze product safety, adverse events, and regulatory compliance. Features certificate verification, reporting dashboards, and risk assessments. Sensitive data is protected using encryption and best security practices, ensuring reliable monitoring and compliance management.
features: Data Encryption and Security Best Practices
Web Security, Performance Optimization, and Caching

title: ePhyto Certificate System
main_description: A digital system for managing phytosanitary certificates with IPPC Hub XML integration, TradeNet connectivity, and multi-channel online payments, available on both web and mobile platforms.
full_description: Developed the ePhyto system for issuing, validating, and managing phytosanitary certificates on both web and mobile platforms. Integrated XML-based communication with IPPC Hub, NSW, and ASW to support cross-border certificate exchange. Included TradeNet API for automated submissions and DICA verification for company registration. Implemented MMQR, Visa, MasterCard, and CBPay payment methods. Ensured secure data handling with encryption, role-based access control, Redis optimization, and mobile-ready architecture.
features: IPPC Hub, NSW, and ASW XML API Integration
MMQR, Visa, MasterCard, and CBPay Payment Integration
Web Security, Performance Optimization, and Caching

title: POS & Online Shop System
main_description: A combined POS and e-commerce platform for managing sales, products, and inventory with real-time reporting.
full_description: Developed a comprehensive POS and online shop system tailored for small and medium-sized businesses. The system includes inventory control, product catalog management, sales processing, customer order handling, and real-time reporting. Designed with a responsive interface for both desktop and mobile devices, ensuring smooth operation in retail environments. Implemented a secure authentication system and optimized the platform for performance and ease of use.

title: Enterprise Server & DevOps Deployment
main_description: Designed and deployed a secure, scalable Linux-based production infrastructure with Nginx/Apache, Redis caching, queue processing, SSL security, domain configuration, and server hardening.
full_description: Configured and deployed a full production-ready server infrastructure on Ubuntu, covering web, application, and database environments. Set up Nginx/Apache virtual hosts, PHP with required extensions, and Composer for application management. Implemented Redis caching and Supervisor-managed queue workers to support high-performance background jobs such as notifications and email processing. Optimized database performance, configured automated daily backups via cron, and applied SSL certificates with HTTPS enforcement. Hardened the system with UFW firewall, Fail2Ban, secure SSH, and proper file permission structures. Integrated Git-based deployment workflows, log rotation, monitoring tools, and multi-application hosting to ensure reliability, scalability, and security.
features: Secure SSH, SFTP & Server Access Policies

title: GitLab Server Deployment
main_description: Installed and configured a self-hosted GitLab Community Edition (CE) server for internal repository management and secure source code collaboration.
full_description: Deployed a self-hosted GitLab Community Edition server to allow internal teams to manage private repositories and collaborate securely. Configured domain, HTTPS, Nginx reverse proxy, SSH access, user/group management, backup scheduling, and essential security hardening. Ensured stable performance and reliable access for daily development operations.
features: GitLab CE Installation on Linux Server

title: Infinity Subscription UI Showcase
main_description: A modern and responsive subscription and product showcase UI built with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS, designed for fast performance and clean visual presentation.
full_description: Infinity is a frontend-only React application powered by Vite for blazing-fast development and TailwindCSS for modern, utility-first styling. The UI showcases subscription plans, product categories, and smooth animated interactions. The project uses DaisyUI for component styling, React Router for navigation, and mock JSON data to simulate real API responses. Designed to highlight strong UI/UX design, component reusability, and modern frontend architecture.
features: Dynamic Product Listing with Category Filters
Smooth Page Navigation Using React Router
Responsive UI Built with TailwindCSS & DaisyUI

title: Kaung Htet Zaw â€” Personal Portfolio
main_description: A fully responsive and modern personal portfolio built with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS, featuring smooth animations, optimized routing, and a clean UI design to showcase skills, projects, and contact information.
full_description: This portfolio website is a modern, high-performance frontend project designed to highlight my skills, professional experience, and showcased projects. Built using React and Vite for speed and efficiency, the UI is styled with TailwindCSS and DaisyUI for clean and consistent design. Framer Motion provides elegant animations, while React Router enables smooth page transitions. The contact form is integrated with EmailJS, allowing for direct email communication without a backend server. The site is fully responsive, optimized for fast loading, and deployed on a custom domain.
